name: SliderWidgetHelper.SliderBuilder
description: The SliderWidgetHelper.SliderBuilder class is a builder pattern implementation for creating slider widgets with configurable ranges, step sizes, initial values, and event handling.
overview:
The SliderWidgetHelper.SliderBuilder class is a builder pattern implementation for creating slider widgets with configurable ranges, step sizes, initial values, and event handling. It provides a fluent interface for constructing interactive slider controls that can be added to custom screens and overlays in JSMacros.

The SliderBuilder class enables the creation of customizable slider widgets with:
- Configurable step ranges (minimum 2 steps)
- Initial value positioning
- Change event callbacks with MethodWrapper
- Inherited positioning, sizing, and styling from AbstractWidgetBuilder
- Method chaining for fluent configuration
- Integration with IScreen rendering system

constructors.description: Creates a new SliderBuilder instance for the specified screen.

parameters.name: screen
parameters.description: The screen to which the slider will be added

methods.name: steps
methods.description: Sets the number of steps for the slider.

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description: The amount of steps for the slider. Must be greater or equal to 2

methods.name: getSteps
methods.description: Returns the configured number of steps.

methods.name: initially
methods.description: Sets the initial value of the slider.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The initial value of the slider. Must be between 0 and steps - 1

methods.name: action
methods.description: Sets the change listener callback for the slider.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The change listener for the slider

methods.name: createWidget
methods.description: Creates and returns the actual SliderWidgetHelper instance. Note: This method is called internally by build(). Use build() to add the widget to the screen.
